subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Beltre hit three home runs, including two in a nine-run fourth inning, and had five runs batted in in the Texas Rangers’ 12-3 victory over the visiting Baltimore Orioles on Wednesday night.
snippet: Beltre hit three home runs, including two in a nine-run fourth inning, and had five runs batted in in the Texas Rangers’ 12-3 victory over the visiting Baltimore Orioles on Wednesday night.
